settings.content: We want your installation to be quick and painless. Please use the below video resources as guides to help you install your Knekt Mounts Rings to your optics. Feel Free to contact our customer service team if you have have questions.

BINOCULAR TIP: Decide which eyecup you want to install your Knekt Mount on by placing your phone as it would technically sit if everything was installed. Play around with both eyecups to decide which one suits your needs best.

For example, iPhones will sit above the binoculars in landscape and inside the binocular in portrait if you install the Knekt Ring in the right eyecup. Alternatively, an iPhone will sit below the binoculars in landscape and just outside the binoculars in portrait if you install the Knekt Mount in the left eyecup.

settings.text: Install Knekt Ring Mount on Binoculars
